subject: Mail From Mrs Magrate Robinson. FBI Representative Agent
body:
Dear

I am writing to acknowledge receipt of your mail and what you said is
clearly noted and understood.

 As a matter of fact, we are assigned by the authority to be in charge to
handle beneficiaries payment file who are yet to receive their funds from
the Nigeria government which your name is among the beneficiaries.

I contacted you so that i will let you know your name is in the list of
unpaid beneficiaries by the Nigeria Government, therefore I advise you to
send me the following information below, because i am going to use your
information to secure legal and genuine document to back up the funds
transaction in your name as the beneficiary to receive the said funds which
is the sum of US$5.5M.

Your full name............................

Your house address...........................

Your contact telephone number.........................

Your occupation...................Age...............Sex...........Marital
Status...........

Your ID Card or Passport.....................

Do send the mentioned information as soon as possible to enable me commence
with the legal documentation.
Thanks,
Mrs Magrate Robinson.
FBI Representative Agent
